column1: 2791e111-6a7b-4656-abd8-1be1b009efe7,2fa-disabled,2FA Disabled Notification,Two-Factor Authentication Disabled - MineGlance,"<div style=""font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif

column5: >Two-factor authentication has been disabled on your MineGlance account.
>Your account is now protected by password only. We recommend re-enabling 2FA for maximum security.

column4: >Warning: If you did not disable 2FA, your account may be compromised. Please change your password immediately and contact support@mineglance.com

column5: >Two-factor authentication has been successfully enabled on your MineGlance account.

column1: Note: Your license can be activated on up to 3 devices. If you need to switch devices, you can deactivate old ones from Settings.

This link will expire in 24 hours. If you didn't create an account, you can safely ignore this email.

b43f628e-8f64-4727-a4dd-5813044e6512,user-2fa-disabled,User 2FA Disabled Notification,Two-Factor Authentication Disabled - MineGlance,"<div style=""font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif

column5: >Two-factor authentication has been disabled on your MineGlance account.
>Your account is now protected by password only. We strongly recommend re-enabling 2FA for maximum security.

column4: >Warning: If you did not disable 2FA, your account may be compromised. Please change your password immediately and contact support@mineglance.com

c239bcc9-910e-4597-b2c4-e9486900dec9,user-2fa-enabled,User 2FA Enabled Confirmation,Two-Factor Authentication Enabled - MineGlance,"<div style=""font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif

column5: >Two-factor authentication has been successfully enabled on your MineGlance account.
>From now on, you will need to enter a code from your authenticator app when signing in to the dashboard.

column4: >Important: Make sure you have saved your backup codes in a safe place. If you lose access to your authenticator app, you will need them to sign in.
>Security Alert: If you did not enable 2FA, please contact support immediately at support@mineglance.com

column1: ",Sent when a user enables 2FA on their dashboard account,"[""email"", ""fullName""]",true,2026-01-18 21:46:50.887492+00,2026-01-18 21:46:50.887492+00
